Name: Strategic Outreach Engine
Tagline: Cold outreach that converts at scale
Excerpt: 10-step cold email system with precision targeting, AI personalization, and intelligent reply detection. Average 5% reply rates.
Description: From ICP identification to closed meeting. Our Strategic Outreach Engine handles mailbox setup, segmentation, Clay enrichment (waterfall), ironclad copy with A/Z testing and spintax, Instantly.ai delivery, and Slack/Airtable routing.

Name: Modular Revenue Infrastructure
Excerpt: Complete pipeline automation from lead capture to client success. CRM sync, AI proposals, instant provisioning.
Description: Three modular phases that scale with you. Phase 1 (Conversion): Intake to CRM to Slack to booking reminders. Phase 2 (Sales Ops): Call transcription, auto-proposals, invoicing, alerts. Phase 3 (Success): Payment triggers instant provisioning, Slack channels, Drive folders, kickoff emails.

Name: High-Performance Web Design
Excerpt: React and Node.js sites with clean animations, API integrations, and conversion-focused design. Voice embeds optional.
Description: High-performance websites built for conversion. React frontends, Node.js backends, clean animations, API integrations, and optional voice AI embeds. Portfolio: Botlytics, Personal Training Brand, Children's Camp, MyHairSalon (Voice Agency).

Name: Content Pal
Excerpt: AI-powered digital newsroom that detects trends, generates media, and auto-publishes to TikTok, Reels, and Shorts.
Description: Content Pal runs around the clock. Trend detection identifies what's hot. AI generates video and image content. Human review queue ensures quality. Auto-publishing pushes to TikTok, Instagram Reels, and YouTube Shorts.
